column1: # Title: Information about fossil resource prices in select marker regions
# Units: Nominal $/tonne for coal; Nominal $/millBtu for natural gas; and Nominal $/barrel for crude oil

# Comments: To get the resource price data in this file from BP stats review file; copy German import price column in "Gas: Prices" sheet for natural gas; copy Northwest Europe marker price and Japan steam coal import CIF price for coal from "Coal: Prices" sheet; and copy Brent column from "Spot crude pricew" sheet for crude oil.  Note that resource with multiple markers will use straight mean of those regions.
